QuestData.Title: Dark Assassins
QuestData.Description: Even I get hunted, $c. But that's part of the fun of hiding amongst the sheep.$B$B<Garona studies you for a moment.>$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer has taken it up a notch and sent their dark assassins after me. Nice for a group of dead guys. They're made from the souls of only the most skilled killers.$B$BDo me a favor? Hunt them down.$B$BThey wear their souls in pendants about their necks. Bring them back to me. Souls optional.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many pendants do you have?
QuestData.RewardText: What do you think I should do with all of these? Maybe I'll melt them down and have the metal imbued into a new dagger that I can thrust into Cho'gall's chest.$B$BThink there's time for that?
